docs.snippet: An academic who advises the armed services says that certain cultural dynamics, magnified in the military, explain and abet sexual violence....
docs.lead_paragraph: An academic who advises the armed services says that certain cultural dynamics, magnified in the military, explain and abet sexual violence.
docs.abstract: Frank Bruni Op-Ed column discusses cultural dynamics that inform stubborn trend of sexual violence against women in America; relates theories of psychology professor and military adviser Chris Kilmartin, who attributes problem to devaluation of women and culture of hyper-masculinity that are especially prevalent in sports and armed forces.
